member.name: APPACTIONFLAGS
member.summary: Specifies application management actions supported by an application publisher. These flags are bitmasks passed to .

member.name: APPACTIONFLAGS.APPACTION_INSTALL
member.summary: Indicates that the application can be installed. Published applications always set this bit.

member.name: APPACTIONFLAGS.APPACTION_ADDLATER
member.summary: Indicates that the application supports scheduled installation. If this bit is set, then the Control Panel's Add or Remove Programs application presents the user an Add Later button. If you select Add Later, you are prompted to select the desired time of installation. The method is then called with the installation time.
